articles.title: Arc Raiders Will Get "Multiple Maps" This Year
articles.title_tr: Arc Raiders Will Get "Multiple Maps" This Year
articles.summary: Arc Raiders was one of the big hits from 2025, and Embark isn't going to let that momentum wane in 2026. The studio has indicated that there are multiple new maps on the horizon, as well as an upcoming content roadmap."There are going to be multiple maps coming this year," said Arc Raiders design lead Virgil Watkins during an interview with GamesRadar. "And I think it's going to be across a spectrum of size to try to facilitate different types of gameplay. So you might see some that are smaller, and you might see some that are even grander than what we've got now."Watkins didn't share specific details about what will be featured in the new maps, but he added that "the ambition is to try to pair it with some new type of experience, whether that's the map conditions or weather conditions we put in that make the play feel different, enemy types or compositions feeling different, or we're escalating the types of loot available there."Continue Reading at GameSpot

So you might see some that are smaller, and you might see some that are even grander than what we've got now."Watkins didn't share specific details about what will be featured in the new maps, but he added that "the ambition is to try to pair it with some new type of experience, whether that's the map conditions or weather conditions we put in that make the play feel different, enemy types or compositions feeling different, or we're escalating the types of loot available there."Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Fallout Season 2 Viewership Numbers Are Way Down, But There Is An Obvious Reason Why
articles.title_tr: Fallout Season 2 Viewership Numbers Are Way Down, But There Is An Obvious Reason Why
articles.summary: The newest Nielsen ratings have arrived, showing a gigantic drop-off for Fallout Season 2 compared to Fallout Season 1. However, there is an obvious explanation for the dip.According to The Hollywood Reporter, Fallout viewership reached 794 million minutes on Prime Video for the week of December 15-21, which covers when Season 2 debuted on December 16. Season 1 racked up 2.9 billion minutes of streaming time during its own opening week in April 2024. That's a 72% decrease, but the massive downturn was no doubt attributable to how the two seasons were released.          Season 1, many may recall, was released in a binge format with all episodes arriving at the same time. Season 2, meanwhile, is adopting a weekly release schedule. What's more, just one episode of Fallout Season 2 was released on December 16, compared to two or three that Prime Video does for some of its other shows.Continue Reading at GameSpot

That's a 72% decrease, but the massive downturn was no doubt attributable to how the two seasons were released.          Season 1, many may recall, was released in a binge format with all episodes arriving at the same time. Season 2, meanwhile, is adopting a weekly release schedule. What's more, just one episode of Fallout Season 2 was released on December 16, compared to two or three that Prime Video does for some of its other shows.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: God Of War TV Show May Have Found Another Actor
articles.title_tr: God Of War TV Show May Have Found Another Actor
articles.summary: Following the recent announcement that Ryan Hurst will play Kratos in the upcoming God of War TV series at Prime Video, another casting detail has come to light.Deadline reports that Teresa Palmer will star on the show as Phoebe/Sif, who is Thor's wife. The Australian actor and model is known for her work on the TV shows The Family Next Door and The Last Anniversary. She also had roles in the movies Warm Bodies and The Fall Guy.The God of War TV show, which hails from Battlestar Galactica's Ronald D. Moore, has already been ordered for two seasons. Frederick E.O. Toye (The Boys, Fallout) is directing the first two episodes. There is no release date yet.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Helldivers 2 Is Letting Players Vote On Which Planet Gets Hit By Its Not-A-Death-Star
articles.title_tr: Helldivers 2 Is Letting Players Vote On Which Planet Gets Hit By Its Not-A-Death-Star
articles.summary: Helldivers 2 prides itself on the concept of Managed Democracy, and in the latest example of crowdsourced decision-making, the game is asking players to choose a planet to blow up with a shiny new not-a-Death-Star superweapon. Fortunately, these planets aren't home to any brave Helldivers and are instead populated by the undemocratic factions that refuse to yield to Super Earth.The latest twist in the Helldivers 2 saga kicked off last week when Super Earth announced that it was upgrading the Democracy Space Station with the Star of Peace weapon. The platform can now fire a "macro-scale laser" optimized for "mass Freedom dispensation" that collapses an entire planet into a black hole.Helldivers players are now being asked to boot up the Democracy Space Station voting panel from their Galactic Map and choose one of three planets: Zagon Prime, Penta, or Valmox. These are held by the Terminids, Automatons, and Illuminate, respectively.Continue Reading at GameSpot

These are held by the Terminids, Automatons, and Illuminate, respectively.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: All Armor Crafting Recipes In Hytale
articles.title_tr: All Armor Crafting Recipes In Hytale
articles.summary: There are few things more important in Hytale than the armor your character equips. Armor can save you from dying to a dangerous mob when you're exploring at night or in a dark cave. It also plays a large part in how your character looks, which does play a factor in your experience if you play in third person. While you might have already figured out how to craft the most basic armor in Hytale, there are several more advanced options that offer stronger protection from mobs.The guide below shows you all of the current crafting recipes we have for armor in Hytale. As a note, some armor that you see in a Creative-mode world might not be available in Survival yet, similar to our guide on all Hytale weapons.Table of Contents [hide]How to craft armor in HytaleHow to craft armor in HytaleA character donning some rare armor in HytaleIf you view your character from the inventory screen in Hytale, you'll see that you have four available slots to equip armor. These slots are for your Helm, Gauntlets, Cuirass, and Greaves. For some reason, there is no dedicated boot slot, but maybe that will be added in a future update. You also have a slot for a shield, but that's not necessarily armor, so we won't be covering those crafting recipes.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: How To Increase Inventory Space In Hytale - Backpack Upgrade Guide
articles.title_tr: How To Increase Inventory Space In Hytale - Backpack Upgrade Guide
articles.summary: Your starting inventory space in Hytale is likely all you need early on. You won't have access to a huge amount of resources or gear yet, so your inventory is plenty for what you need until you build a chest for extra storage. However, as you go along, you'll find more and more materials to pick up, which fills up your inventory quickly. While you might think you'll always be left with the default inventory size, that's not the case in Hytale.How to unlock the backpack in HytaleTo increase the size of your inventory, you need to unlock and use the backpack in Hytale. The backpack is a separate item from the default inventory, but its sole goal is to give you more slots to put items.Fortunately, the backpack is unlocked fairly early on in Hytale, as all you have to do is upgrade your workbench to tier two. You can read about all Hytale workbenches in our previous guide, but getting a workbench to tier two requires the following resources:Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.summary: Avrupa borsaları, haftanın son işlem gününü düşüşle tamamladı. Avrupa borsaları kapanışında gösterge endeksi Stoxx Europe 600, yüzde 0,12 değer kaybederek 613,82 puana geriledi.

articles.title: Bose is clearing out refurbished audio products, including a soundbar for just $99
articles.title_tr: Bose is clearing out refurbished audio products, including a soundbar for just $99
articles.summary:
Save on earbuds, headphones, soundbars, portable speakers, and more. All Bose refurbished products come with a full 1-year warranty.
The post Bose is clearing out refurbished audio products, including a soundbar for just $99 appeared first on Popular Science.

articles.title: Balıkesir'de otomobil şarampole uçtu: Anne ve kızı yaralandı
articles.title_tr: Balıkesir'de otomobil şarampole uçtu: Anne ve kızı yaralandı
articles.summary: Balıkesir'de kontrolden çıkan otomobilin şarampole uçtuğu kazada anne ve kızı yaralandı.Edinilen bilgiye göre, Altıeylül ilçesi Küçükbostancı Mahallesi'nde, G.Ç. idaresindeki 10 KD 825 plakalı otomobil, sürücüsünün direksiyon hakimiyetini kaybetmesi sonucu şarampole yuvarlandı. Kazada anne G.Ç. ve kızı M.Ç. yaralandı. İhbar üzerine olay yerine itfaiye, sağlık ve polis ekipleri sevk edildi. Anne ve kızı, olay yerindeki ilk müdahalenin ardından ambulansla hastaneye kaldırıldı. Kazayla ilgili soruşturma sürüyor.
